extendedInfo.description: The masterpiece of 2D action-shooting, "METAL SLUG X",  lands on Android! Foil General Morden's new coup attempt!!Features list:âA remake of "METAL SLUG 2"!"METAL SLUG X" is an updated version of "METAL SLUG 2" with a lot of new elements for even more fun and excitement!Bosses and other enemy characters await you at different points on the battlefield, so that even players who have perfected the previous installment will enjoy this new and improved game map!âShoot down your enemies with new weapons!!New weapons, such as the "Iron Lizard" (remote-controlled missiles), the "Drop Shot" (bouncing landmines), and the "Enemy Chaser" (homing missiles), have been added to the impressive METAL SLUG arsenal.   âAn "Arcade-Perfect" NEOGEO Port with extra features!In addition to the classic âARCADE MODEâ, you can select any mission you have previously cleared and play them separately in âMISSION MODEâ. You can enjoy your favorite stages at will and train on the missions you have not mastered yet!âPrecise and Customizable Controls!The Autofire function allows you to fire continuously by holding down the Shot button. Moreover, you can change the position of your configuration outside of the game screen area in âWindowâ Mode. Enjoy every pixel of âMETAL SLUG Xâ with your very own custom controls! âEngage into intense Multiplayer gameplay via Bluetooth!Now you can enjoy âMETAL SLUG Xâ with a friend through a Bluetooth connection. Team up with a brother in arms to accomplish together the difficult missions available in âMETAL SLUG Xâ!âCompatible with âSCORE LOOPâ! Complete the maximum number of âACHIEVEMENTSâ in order to increase your "METAL SLUG X" Player Rank!Beat the best scores and become Worldâs Number 1!!

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Played this when I was younger. Great to see it on android. A huge plus that it works with the xperia play controller.
reviews.author: Abraham Perez

reviews.title: Not playable Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: Can\'t be played. On my galaxy s4 the buttons are huge and keeps freezing.   Don\'t buy it.    Please refund or fix.
reviews.author: Alex De Leon

reviews.title: Needs Nvidia shield support
reviews.comment: Was hoping to play this game on my Nvidia shield, but the d-pad or joystick don\'t work. The other buttons for jump, shoot, and grenades work great.
reviews.author: Cesar Velazquez

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Everyday I go to play this game it crashes every time...I can\'t beat a single level and still haven\'t yet... its a paid game and shouldn\'t be crashing...FIX IT ASAP!!!
reviews.author: Chris Ishida

reviews.title: Almost great port of an amazing game
reviews.comment: As good as the other metal slugs. However it slowdowns and crashes alot more frequently than the others.
reviews.author: Eleaor F.

reviews.title: Great version of a great game
reviews.comment: Unlike MS3 in the app store this one actually remembers your button configuration, has a larger react space around the joy pad, and continues from the last level reached...there are even graphical improvements over the original and the welcome mission mode. Still lags like the original but not a blatantly lazy porting job like MS3.
reviews.author: Mike Tsenter

reviews.title: Fix the buttons!
reviews.comment: The buttons are way to big i cant play it at all on my htc one! Refund me or fix it. Also crashes alot.
reviews.author: Levi Beazley

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4 GPe
reviews.comment: Won\'t download on my Samsung Galaxy S4 GPe, Android 4.3.  These developers are terrible.  They won\'t even rework the Metal Slug app controls to work with 1080p screens.
reviews.author: Jeremy Maxwell

reviews.title: Xperia Play Optimized
reviews.comment: Not sure why they don\'t advertise it, but the game works with XP controller.
reviews.author: Kenneth Barber

reviews.title: Nice port. :)
reviews.comment: I can\'t resize the button, and the dpad always conflict with A button, bad multitouch.. please fix it. My phone is 1080p, the buttons way too large..
reviews.author: Cheng Fox

reviews.title: Crashing Constantly
reviews.comment: This game crashes constantly on my phone. HTC Amaze 4G
reviews.author: Jorge Garcia

reviews.title: Issue with HTC One
reviews.comment: Strangely the buttons are too big that they overlap, making it unplayable on this device. Other that it\'s a good game on other devices.
reviews.author: Steven Lehmann

reviews.title: FIX BUTTON SIZE
reviews.comment: Before I upgraded to my S4 from my old S2 I played this game for hours on end! But now I can not play due to the oversized buttons that can not be downsized!! Please fix this issue so I can start playing again!!!
reviews.author: Timothy W

reviews.title: One x
reviews.comment: This really is metal slug! As good as i expected, crashes sometimes. Worth the money for me.
reviews.author: buubised

reviews.title: Nog optimized
reviews.comment: It\'s not a bad game but it\'s not optimized for android.
reviews.author: Quentin Christiaens

reviews.title: No moga?
reviews.comment: Please add moga support so I can rate 5 \342\230\205\'s.
reviews.author: Karl Warfield

reviews.title: Great on Xperia Play
reviews.comment: Great game with Xperia Play support.  Worth the money for sure.
reviews.author: Geoffrey Edwards
